name: Mobile Life
description:
Keep it, or drop it?Mobile Life

This game is made for ludum dare 31, the theme goes 'Entire game on one screen'. Then I start to think, life is like game, so the new topic comes out 'entire life on one screen'. Recently, mobile devices get involved into our life, even take the place of our parents and friends. This is happening around us, so... focus on your life.
